errors.name: MinimumAmountNotMet
errors.msg: Error: Amount must be greater than or equals to 0.1 sols!

errors.name: CommitAmountExceeded
errors.msg: Error: Commit amount can't be exceeded by max allowable commit amount!

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Error: All tokens are claimed already!

errors.name: AlreadyApproved
errors.msg: Error: Proposal is already approved by same approver!

errors.name: DaoNotInTrading
errors.msg: Error: Dao status is not Trading!

errors.name: NotApproved
errors.msg: Proposal has not been approved yet.
